title: I want to have a system of adding predefined Keywords and weights for documents, when new index are being made.
description: JATE toolkit gives an easy way to find all the keywords in corpus along with a weight of each keyword. I want to develop a mechanism of incorporating that list into Lucene.

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.content: Maybe start by sending an email to java-user@lucene.apache.org explaining what you've tried so far, asking for suggestions?
